Thanks for posting the information.  I tried to access the website but it 
froze my computer.

Do you have any information on the composition of the forces?  I'd love to 
find out the ratio between cavalry and infantry.  I'd also like to find a 
breakdown for the infantry (eg. how many Samurai, how many Ashigaru, if any of the 
Ashigaru had arquebusses, or if they were all armed with bows, etc.).

Thanks in advance.

Bob Burke

In a message dated 5/1/05 9:05:53 PM, 004040@... writes:

<< OLIVERIO Christophe wrote:


>Thanks for your response, but I look the

>http://www.samurai-archives.com but there is not

>any battle order for japanese army of the invasion of

>korea in 1592

>

>if I can reformule my demand, I want the detail of the

>troops in the invasion army of the korea :

>the generals, the number and kind of every units

>( samurais, ashigaru, servants ... )

>

>books or url links can be the answer

>

>thanks

>

>  

>

Involved Daimyous and number of mobilized soldiers


"Bunroku no Eki" (1592)


    1st corps:18700

      Yukinaga KONOSHI, Yoshitosi SOU, Shigenobu MATSURA,

      Harunobu ARIMA, Yoshiaki OOMURA, Sumiharu GOTOU


    2nd corps:22800

      Kiyomasa KATOU, Naoshige NABESHIMA, Yorifusa SAGARA


    3rd corps:11000

      Nagamasa KURODA, Yoshimune OOTOMO


    4th corps:14000

      Yoshimari MOURI, Yoshihiro SHIMADZU, Suketaka ITOU,

      Tadatoyo SHIMADZU


    5th corps:25100

      Masanori FUKUSHIMA, Motochika CHOUSOKABE, Iemasa HACHISUKA

      Chikanari IKOMA, Michiyuki KOJIMA


    6th corps:15700

      Takakage KOBAYAKAWA, Hidekane KOBAYAKAWA (aka MOURI),

      Munesgige TACHIBANA


    7th corps:30000

      Terumoto MOURI


    8th corps:10000

      Hideie UKITA


    9th corps:11500

      Hidekatsu HASHIBA, Tadaoki NAGAOKA (aka HOSOKAWA)

 

  Sum:158800



"Keichou no Eki" (1597)


    1st corps:10000

      Kiyomasa KATOU


    2nd corps:14700

      Yukinaga KONISHI, Yoshitoshi SOU


    3rd corps:10000

      Nagamasa KURODA


    4th corps:12000

      Naoshige NABESHIMA


    5th corps:10000

      Yoshihiro SHIMADZU


    6th corps:13200

      Yoshiaki KATOU


    7th corps:11000

      Iemasa HACHISUKA


    8th corps:40000

      Hidemoto MOURI, Hideie UKITA


    'Pusanpo' castle garrison:10307

      Hideaki KOBAYAKAWA


    'Angolpo' castle garrison:5000

      Muneshige TACHIBANA


    'Kadok' castle garrison:1000

      Naotsugu TAKAHASI


    'Chookto' castle garrison:1000

      Hidekane KOBAYAKAWA


    'Seosengpo' castle garrison:3000

      Yoshinaga ASANO


  Sum:141390



*Reference: "Bunroku / Keichou no Eki" in Japanese Wikipedia

  http://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E6%96%87%E7%A6%84%E3%81%AE%E5%BD%B9
